name: Tanuki No Tabi
description:
Taunki No Tabi (Tanuki's Journey) is a top-down, action-adventure shooter in a world featuring three clans, the Tanuki, the Saru and the Kitsune. Each individual species has an unique ability blessed upon a selected few by the Gods. The blessings obtained helps the races to prosper and live together peacefully. You get to play as Kotarou, a Tanuki that seeks to grow stronger and rescue his sister from the Kitsune who became greedy for power. Explore the world and earn gifts from the gods scattered across the land!

Download and extract the files on to your desktop, simply run the exe to play the game!

For more information or any questions, u can check out the project on
https://mtotatm.wixsite.com/tinyinfinity/tanuki-no-tabi
